comment: Not good at all. No help. Had no idea what she was talking about. Didn't know course requirements. That being said, I loved the school I was placed at for observation hours and that is the only thing I liked about this class. Classes were a waste of time.

Worst class I have EVER taken. She is by far the worst professor I have had. All of her lectures are pointless and she never knows what she is talking about. Most of the information she tried to teach us contradicted everything we have learned in our other classes. She is not clear about any of our projects and is no help if you are confused.

Amazing this woman is still around.  Very unprofessional- she only teaches 2 classes during the entire semester- the rest are taught by the class. She's too lazy to do anything, which is why her students end up teaching. Observations are a WASTE OF TIME, as is the entire class. She's unclear about expectations- her class is painful to sit through.

This teacher is very scatterbrained.She puts questions on tests that she never went over and then tells you that you should have learned it in a class you haven't even taken yet.She cancels class all the time.She doesn't clarify assignments.She gives you grades for doing the work,but she doesn't teach anything.She makes the students present materia

This woman is only concerned about NAME and herself. She cancels class because she schedules meetings during class time- she also bad mouths previous principals she's worked with, as well as the ECE administrators at KSU. Makes students teach chapters because she's too lazy to teach. I GOT NOTHING FROM THIS CLASS. STAY AWAY.
never in class cancelled class for 3 weeks. too busy with her church and multicultural stuff
EASY A...this class can be sort of boring and is full of common sense stuff, but she is very easy and there is not much work to do. Take her if you want a slack class!
Dr. Howell is very nice. Some people criticize her for being ****...which she was to a certain extent. But, it is not as bad as some people say. Her classes are definitely easy A's!
She is a very nice teacher, but she talks very slow so her class can be very boring. Her class is an easy A and she is very willing to help you achieve that A.
